Package com.example.freeturilo.core

Class StationCondition

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.freeturilo.core.StationCondition
  • public class StationCondition
extends java.lang.Object
    Collection of static methods that help represent a Station with text or a Marker.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Miko≈Çaj Terzyk
    See Also:
